title: Mac OS X Lion-TNH
description:

Instructions:

Drag to Applications folder and Install.

****************************************

This is the full version of OS X Lion released July 20th 2011.

It works, Enjoy.


****Update****

1) Right click the file and select Show Package Contents
2) Navigate to Contents -> SharedSupport
3) Open InstallESD.dmg
4) Open the Lion installer
